movie.title: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
movie.title_english: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid
movie.title_long: Honey, I Blew Up the Kid (1992)
movie.description_intro: Wayne Szalinski is at it again. But instead of shrinking things, he tries to make a machine that can make things grow. As in the first one, his machine isn't quite accurate. But when he brings Nick & his toddler son Adam to see his invention, the machine unexpectedly starts working. And when Adam comes right up to the machine, he gets zapped along with his stuffed bunny. Now, whenever Adam comes near anything electrical, the electricity causes him to grow. Adam soon starts to grow to the height of over 100 feet. And he is now walking through Las Vegas which he thinks is one big play land.
movie.description_full: Wayne Szalinski is at it again. But instead of shrinking things, he tries to make a machine that can make things grow. As in the first one, his machine isn't quite accurate. Now, whenever Adam comes near anything electrical, the electricity causes him to grow. Adam soon starts to grow to the height of over 100 feet. And he is now walking through Las Vegas which he thinks is one big play land.

movies.title: Travels of Mr. Kleks
movies.summary: Mr. Kleks visits at night, a boy who is a patient at the hospital. He decides to tell him a story, starting with the fact that Great Elektronik together with your robots conquered the island of inventors.
movies.description_full: Mr. Kleks visits at night, a boy who is a patient at the hospital. He decides to tell him a story, starting with the fact that Great Elektronik together with your robots conquered the island of inventors.

movies.title: Ninja Operation 7: Royal Warriors
movies.summary: Released here in the UK under the alternative title of, Ninja Operation 7: Royal Warriors; this has to be one of my very favourites of its insane cut & paste kind! So what do you get for your moneys worth in this entry? Well brace yourself because this offers up a heady combination of treasure hunting, female slavery, kung fu, cannibals, a jungle Jane, bare boobies, a cave dwelling old hermit, an evil Willy (that's a characters name by the way!) and last but not least, ninja! My God! What the hell more could have been inserted into this insane cinematic experience?! Truly, this is a bad movie lovers dream!

movies.title: Knights of the Damned
movies.summary: After relentless attacks on his castle, the King sends his best Knights to defeat the Dragon besieging them. Along their epic adventure they encounter malicious water sirens, a race of warrior women on a mission of revenge and an unstoppable army of the undead. Do they have what it takes to complete their mission and will they uncover the mysterious truth behind their journey?

Do they have what it takes to complete their mission and will they uncover the mysterious truth behind their journey?

movies.title: Yeom-lyeok
movies.summary: Seok-heon, a bank security guard, gains superpowers one day after drinking water from a mountain spring affected by a meteor. He then sets out to protect his estranged daughter Roo-mi and her neighborhood from a construction company controlled by the mafia, using his recently-arrived superpower: the power of psychokinesis, and in the process becomes a superhero.
